title: Customer Provisioning (PoC) â€” Repeatable Runbook Flow

nodes.label: Scope: Backend + Frontend + Agents + Memory + Voice/Avatar
Prerequisites: Subscription, RG, Key Vault, AI Services, ACA, SWA, Entra App
Key Vault Secrets: azure-ai-key, endpoint, project, agent IDs, voicelive, speech, realtime, zep
Container App Env Vars: AZURE_FOUNDRY_AGENT_*, AZURE_VOICELIVE_*, AZURE_OPENAI_REALTIME_*, AZURE_SPEECH_*, ZEP_API_URL, AUTH_*, OIDC_*
Frontend Vite Vars: VITE_API_URL (HTTPS), VITE_WS_URL (wss://), VITE_API_SCOPE
Smoke Tests: Chat, Voice, Avatar, Tri-Search, MCP Tools
Key Files: main.py, memory.py, tools.py, mcp.py, client.py, agent YAMLs, features.json
